approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit and other requirements.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit and other requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency of V-KYC team in accessing recordings.
approval_data.business_context: Currently, the V-KYC team has to request the IT data server team to provide the recordings. The recordings are present at LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server which are retrieved basis the manual request.

requirements.description: A portal/Dashboard to be created and access for that will be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager)
All the recordings of VKYC shall be made available on this portal and will be fetched as and when required
The recording shall be available date, month wise
The recording shall be visible if searched by LAN
An option for users to upload an Excel or text file will be there. This file will allow employees to list up to 50 Lan IDs for which they require video recordings.
The system will trigger a call to backend API to process the request upon file upload.
The results will be displayed on the screen in a tabular format, accompanied by a "Download All" option.
The table pagination will display only 10 records at a time, and similarly only 10 records at a time will be downloaded.
File upload will be csv/txt file.
Post clicking the LAN the recording download shall start
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: User authentication and authorization for accessing the portal.
Search functionality by LAN ID, date, and month.
Display of recording details in a tabular format.
Bulk download functionality (up to 10 records at a time).
File upload functionality for bulk LAN ID input (CSV/TXT).
API integration for processing the download request.
Date and month wise filtering and sorting of recordings.
non_functional_requirements: The system should be accessible only to authorized users (Team Leads and Process Managers).
The system should be able to handle up to 50 LAN IDs in a single bulk download request.
The system should provide a user-friendly interface.
success_criteria: V-KYC team can easily access and download recordings.
Reduced dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
Limited access to the portal for Team Leaders and Process Managers only.
Bulk download limited to 10 records at a time.
assumptions: The existing infrastructure (NFS server, network) is stable and reliable.
The API for retrieving recordings is available and functional.
The users have the necessary permissions to access the required data.
risks: Network issues may affect the download speed.
API unavailability may prevent access to recordings.
Security breaches if access is not properly controlled.

recommendations: Add details on error handling and user feedback.
Specify the security measures to be implemented.

identified_gaps: Error handling and user feedback mechanisms are not clearly defined.
recommendations_for_completion: Provide detailed API specifications including input parameters, output formats, and error codes.
Define error handling and user feedback mechanisms for different scenarios.
Specify security measures for user authentication, authorization, and data protection.
